article.title: Status and history for [guj]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Corrections in the first article: દષ્ટિએ replaced by દૃષ્ટિએ, વિચારશકિત replaced by વિચારશક્તિ. Thanks to Rocky Malaviya, Dave Crossland and Sascha Brawer.
[Eric Muller] the document provided has 65 occurrences of U+200C ZERO WIDTH NON-JOINER, all after some cluster and before a VOWEL LETTER. Removed those, since they are useless there.
stage 4: provided by Kumari Co Ltd via the Language Observatory.
stage 3: OHCHR identified as the source, partial XML contributed by Adobe Systems (from the partial data at ).
